data.name: Descend
data.detailed_description:
Descend is a faithful depiction of SCP-087.

SCP-087 is located on the campus of [REDACTED]. The doorway leading to SCP-087 is constructed of reinforced steel with an electro-release lock mechanism. It has been disguised to resemble a janitorial closet consistent with the design of the building. The lock mechanism on the doorknob will not release unless [REDACTED] volts are applied in conjunction with counter-clockwise rotation of the key. The inside of the door is lined with 6 centimeters of industrial foam padding.

Descend places you in the shoes of a D-Class personnel exploring SCP-087. You will descend the stairs in an unsettling atmosphere until you find more information about the SCP...if you find any. You will explore, look, listen, and walk for as long as you can walk.

Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and all concepts originate from http://www.scpwiki.com and its authors. Descend, being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/legalcode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Celeron 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Embedded
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
